'''1.21.11 Pre-Release 5''' (known as '''1.21.11-pre5''' in the launcher) is the fifth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], released on December 3, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-11-pre-release-5|Minecraft 1.21.11 Pre-Release 5|December 3, 2025}}</ref>

A separate [[unobfuscated version]] of 1.21.11 Pre-Release 5 was released, titled '''1.21.11 Pre-Release 5 Unobfuscated''' (or '''1.21.11-pre5_unobfuscated''' when in the launcher). This is an experimental version released in preparation for obfuscation being removed from {{JE}} clients and servers.<ref>{{Mcnet|removing-obfuscation-in-java-edition|Removing obfuscation in Java Edition|October 29, 2025}}</ref>

This is the final pre-release released in 2025.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.11-pre5
|;dev
|304409|The enchantment glint is extremely bright on items with animated textures.
|304593|Charge attacks from spears held in the off hand can disable shields when holding an axe in the main hand.
|304603|Dolphins no longer follow players in boats.
|;prev
|304703|Zombified piglins stop sprinting after some time while chasing.
}}</onlyinclude>
